snippet: A small group of technical workers at the Amazon warehouse in Middletown, Del., voted overwhelmingly against joining the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers.
abstract: Small group of technical workers at Amazon warehouse in Middletown, Del, vote overwhelmingly against joining the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers.
lead_paragraph: A small group of technical workers at the Amazon warehouse in Middletown, Del., voted overwhelmingly against joining the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers.

headline.main: Workers at an Amazon Warehouse Reject Forming a Union
